content: stitches through the back loop tip tuck in your tail to the inside of the mitten before continuing to knit knit all stitches for every round for 10 rounds or until it reaches just past the thumb when worn tip be sure to count your rounds so you know how many rounds to knit for the 2nd mitten k2tog repeat till end of round 7 stitches remaining break yarn and with darning needle draw through remaining stitches pull to close push needle through hole to inside secure by threading again through last few stitches weave in end when weaving in ends take the tail from the start of the thumb and stitch to close up the two gaps at the base of the thumb weave in all other ends 3 | p a ge © jacqueline henderson www youtube com/@jacqknits
